meanings.definition: A class of proteins derived from the hydrolysis of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied albumoses in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Albumoses are important components of our diet.
meanings.sent3: The albumoses at the party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like albumoses, breaking down barriers effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The albumoses under the microscope looked like tiny building blocks.

meanings.definition: A type of protein that is soluble in water and precipitated by alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The albumoses dissolved easily in the solution.
meanings.sent2: When alcohol was added, the albumoses separated out.
meanings.sent3: The albumoses in the water seemed to dance as the alcohol was poured in.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled like albumoses in a liquid, clear one moment and cloudy the next.
meanings.sent5: The albumoses in the experiment behaved unpredictably, surprising the researchers.
